entry.title: Maltesers Celebration Size - 800g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars Inc.
Type: Chocolate
Price: 18.74

Celebration Time C'mon!!

It's time to celebrate Maltesers

Maltesers are a classic Old Fashioned & Nostalgic Candy from the 1930's. A delicious malt honeycomb center covered covered with milk chocolate. A crunchy and light snack. Believe it or not, but this amazing candy had made it all over the world but only recently was introduced to the United States. In 2017 Maltesers finally began being sold all over America. The chocolate is still produced in Newmarket Ontario, but a large majority of that is now exported. Finally Americans are able to enjoy something we've been snacking on for over 50 years!

Maltesers are one of the Top 10 Canadian Candies.

 

800g

Original Classic Recipe

A cherished Canadian tradition since 1949

Guaranteed it’ll have anyone saying “Mmm... I love TURTLES”

entry.title: Nestle Smarties Milk Chocolate Tablet Bar - 100 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.49

A new way to eat Smarties candies!

Snap off a piece of… SMARTIES? That's right! Nestle Smarties Milk Chocolate Tablet Bar is a new way to experience - and share - the love of candy-coated, milk chocolate Smarties. This milk chocolate bar is filled with mini Smarties candy-coated milk chocolate pieces adding a colourful crunch within smooth chocolate deliciousness. It's easy to break off one of the 18 square pieces to share with family and friends. Plus, it's all wrapped up in recyclable paper packaging, which helps ensure that the environment stays as vibrant as Smarties pieces. Made in Switzerland with 100% natural colours and flavours, Nestle purchases 100% RAINFOREST ALLIANCE certified cocoa, as part of the NESTLÉ Cocoa Plan. They work with the Rainforest Alliance and farmers to improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities.

  • Made in Switzerland
  • No Artificial Colours
  • No Artificial Flavours
  • UTZ Certified

    • 100 g

entry.title: Aero Truffle Chocolate Mousse Milk Chocolate Bar - 105 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.49

A Delightful Canadian Chocolate Bar!

Pure Chocolate Bliss.

As if Aero milk chocolate wasn't decadent enough, Aero Truffle Chocolate Mousse Milk Chocolate Bar introduces a new way to experience pure chocolate bliss. Each delicious chocolate bar piece is rich in milk chocolate with a bubbly milk chocolate truffle centre you can't resist. It's so smooth, so delightfully melt-in-your-mouth, you'll want to break off a piece to share with family and friends. After all, good things are made great when experienced with others. It's sure to be your latest craving as you FEEL THE BUBBLES MELT.

Aero Truffle is also available in Black Forest Cake and Tiramisu.

• Made in Canada
• All Natural Flavours and No Artificial Colours
• Sustainably sourced cocoa from the NESTLÉ COCOA PLAN

105 g

entry.title: Cadbury UK Dairy Milk Honeycomb & Nuts - 105g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mondelez
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.39

British Chocolate Bars

Cadbury Dairy Milk Honeycomb & Nuts Chocolate Bar 

Winner of Cadbury's Inventor competition 2020! This is the second year of the Cadbury Inventor competition; Three people were chosen as finalists to find the nation's favourite chocolate and become part of the Dairy Milk line permanently. Cadbury Dairy Milk Honeycomb & Nuts was created by 19-year-old Shannon from the UK after declaring her love for combination of flavours, alongside sweet caramel. 

Cadbury Dairy Milk Honeycomb & Nuts are perfect blends of milk chocolate, honeycomb pieces, caramel flavoured fudge, and chopped hazelnuts! The crunchy texture of golden honeycomb chunks & hazelnuts pair perfectly with smooth milky chocolate to create a truly wonderful chocolate experience. 

  • Suitable for Vegetarians

 

Fresh Candy Shipped Fast Across Canada and The USA from Candyfunhouse.ca!

 

Ingredients

Milk**, Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, Chopped Hazelnuts, Vegetable Fats (Palm, Shea, Coconut), Glucose Syrup, Sweetened Condensed Milk, Emulsifiers (E442, E471, E476), Milk Fat, Humectant (Glycerol), Salt, Raising Agent (E500), Flavourings, ** The equivalent of 426 ml of Fresh Liquid Milk in every 227 g of Milk Chocolate, Milk Chocolate: Milk Solids 20 % minimum, actual 23 %, Cocoa Solids 20 % minimum, Contains Vegetable Fats in addition to Cocoa Butter.

85 g

entry.title: Oh Henry! Level Up - 42 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.99

Canadian Candy Bar

Up your game with this new Canadian chocolate bar. It's chock-full of crunchy pretzel bits and peanuts. It's got a decadent chocolate coating and splash of peanut butter, too. Yes, you've found the snack of your dreams. 

Craving something sweet and salty? Hershey's Oh Henry Level Up has got you covered. Just wait until you rip open that wrapper. You're going to devour this in no time, so don't just get one. This filling candy bar will rev you up for that long afternoon. 

Oh Henry is a name you grew up with and it's time for a walk down memory lane. Oh Henry Level Up is a hearty snack that hits the spot just when you need it.

42 g

New! The iconic M&M'S® you know and love are now available in a bar! Enjoy the flavours of M&M'S® Minis and peanut pieces melted within a delicious creamy milk chocolate bar. 110 g
